page.title: 17FAMILY QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content: ADULTS. {(B) ONE WORRY.}WORRIES ABOUT NUCLEAR WAR. PATRICK {(A) ONE HOPE} HOPES HE WILL BE A MILLIONAIRE WHEN HE GROWS UP. { {(B) ONE WORRY} WORRIES ABOUT BEING KIDNAPPED. {POSSESSIONS} 2 CARS, 6 BICYCLES, 1 DISHWASHER, 1 OVEN, 1 TV, 1 RADIO, 1 TAPE RECORDER, 3 CASSETTE RECORDERS, 1 WASHING MACHINE, 1 RECORD PLAYER, 1 KETTLE, 1 FRIDGE, 1 FREEZER, 1 VACUUM CLEANER, 1 TOASTER, 1 COFFEE MAKER, 1 FOOD PROCESSOR, 1 ELECTRIC DRILL, 1 IRON, 1 HAIRDRYER, 1 COMPUTER, 2 CLOCKS. {MEMBERSHIP OF CLUBS, COMMITTEES} JANE IS A SCHOOL GOVERNOR. SHE IS PART OF THE BABYSITTING CIRCLE. SHE IS A MEMBER OF NATIONAL HOUSEWIFES REGISTER. NICK IS A MEMBER OF SOUTHSEA ROWING {CONT PAGE 18}
